metadata.description: Curated collection of Claude Code plugins: NSIP breeding data, agents, git workflows, monitoring, document processing, ADR management, and project specification lifecycle

plugins.name: datadog
plugins.description: DataDog API specialists for monitoring setup, dashboard creation, metric queries, and APM integration

plugins.name: document-skills
plugins.description: AI-powered document processing for PDF, DOCX, XLSX, and PPTX files with text extraction and analysis

plugins.name: documentation-review
plugins.description: Comprehensive documentation management: review, create, update, and maintain high-quality documentation with AI-powered analysis

plugins.name: human-voice
plugins.description: Detect and prevent AI-generated writing patterns to ensure authentic human voice in content with multi-tier analysis

plugins.name: adr
plugins.description: Complete ADR lifecycle management with multi-format support (MADR, Nygard, Y-Statement), compliance auditing, proactive detection, and configurable workflows

plugins.name: gh
plugins.description: Git workflow commands, GitHub Copilot configuration, and multi-CI migration to GitHub Actions

plugins.name: nsip
plugins.description: NSIP sheep breeding data with 9 MCP tools, 10 slash commands, expert shepherd agent, and 14 intelligent hooks

plugins.name: agents
plugins.description: 115+ specialized Opus 4.5 agents organized by domain with 54 skills for comprehensive development workflows

plugins.name: claude-spec
plugins.description: Project specification lifecycle management with strategic planning, implementation tracking, and retrospectives

plugins.name: subcog
plugins.description: subcog is a Git-backed memory system for Claude Code, capturing decisions, learnings, and context as git notes with semantic search and automatic recall.

plugins.name: git-adr
plugins.description: `git-adr` is a command-line tool that integrates Architecture Decision Record management directly into your git workflow. Unlike file-based ADR tools, `git-adr` stores ADRs in **git notes**,

plugins.name: aesth
plugins.description: Craft-focused design system management powered by Subcog memory. Build interfaces with elegance, consistency, and semantic memory for dashboards, apps, and tools.

plugins.name: github-social
plugins.description: Optimize GitHub repository presentation with social preview images and engaging metadata (descriptions, topics). Supports DALL-E, Stable Diffusion, and gh CLI integration.
